# can print lazy_select_query

    Code
      lazy_select_query(x = lf$lazy_query, select = quos(x_mean = mean(x), y2 = y),
      where = quos(y > 1, x == y - 2), group_by = quos("x"))
    Output
      <SQL SELECT>
      From:
        <table_path> "df"
      Select:   x_mean = mean(x), y2 = y
      Where:    y > 1, x == y - 2
      Group by: "x"

# select_query() print method output is as expected

    Code
      mf
    Output
      SELECT "df".*
      FROM "df"
      WHERE ("x" > 1)
      ORDER BY "x"
      LIMIT 10

# queries generated by select() don't alias unnecessarily

    Code
      lf_render
    Output
      <SQL> SELECT "x"
      FROM "df"

---

    Code
      select(lazy_frame(x = 1, y = 1))
    Condition
      Error in `sql_clause_select()`:
      ! Query contains no columns
